about_the_game:
Release your inner beast and become ruler of the jungle with the Wild Thing DLC pack, featuring three ferocious new weapon skins, usable across all in-game gun models.

Features:
  • Giraffe Park (weapon skin)
  • Alligator Leather (weapon skin)
  • Rhino Rush (weapon skin)

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
